channel.title: Making my "yell" have colour pi 317

item.title: Making my "yell" have colour pi 317
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

If your source has the correct functions for colors already added, try something like this…

@gre@ changes the text to green, as @bla@ changes it back to black, if that doesn’t work you have another option which is either of these two.

Which is a shadowed text, or you could do…

Which is just a color, you’ll have to replace the ###### with HTML notation numbers, which you can find here , note that you should not include the pound symbol.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my "yell" have colour pi 317
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if (Connection.isMuted©) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell.”);
return;
}

			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
						}
					    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Aggroth")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15007744><img=2>[Co-Owner]</col><img=2><shad=16711680>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					    
                                                    }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("hide n seek")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=13989119><img=2>[Web Designer]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");	
													}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("revolution")){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");	
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
						
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Head of Staff]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=2>[Owner of Aggroth]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 5){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=60811334>[Server Sponsor]</col><img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");	
					}
					}
				}
			}
    
      
}[/code]

Theres a better yell especially for you,

also, shad=255 is blue i think

item.title: Making my "yell" have colour pi 317
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

AHHHHHHHHHH…! First, that code(s) is soooo messy and can be made shorter and into ONE code. Second, use code tags. And lastly, add the color tags, which everyone you use, before the player name or title.

item.title: Making my "yell" have colour pi 317
item.dc:creator: @erlasz erlasz
item.description:
@erlasz wrote:

ok so i want to have my name blue in the “yell” chat how can i do this here is my yell.

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mr travis”)) {
String rank = “”;
String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
rank = “[Developer] [”+ c.playerName +"]:";

			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
				}
			}
			return;
		}
		
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("shawn")) {
			String rank = "";
			String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
			rank = "[Server-Owner] ["+ c.playerName +"]:";

			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
				}
			}
			return;
		}
		
	 if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { //support yell
				if((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastyell < 20000) && c.playerRights < 1) {
    				c.sendMessage("You can only yell every 20 seconds.");
    				return;
				}
			String rank = "";
			String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase();
			String [] support = {"josh", "xxxx1", "droppartydan", "alfie", "xxxx1"};
			if (c.isDonator > 0) {

			rank = "[$] ["+c.playerName+"]:";
			}
			if (c.playerRights == 1) {
				rank = "[Moderator] ["+ c.playerName +"]:";
			}
			for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
				if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(support[i])) {
					rank = "[Support] ["+ c.playerName +"]:";
				}
			} 
			if (rank == "")
			return;
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; 
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
					c.lastyell = System.currentTimeMillis();
				}
			}
		}

how can i make the yell blue?please help
